sourceOrganization.name: NIAID DAIDS
sourceOrganization.description: The Division of AIDS (DAIDS) was formed to develop and implement the national research agenda to address the HIV/AIDS epidemic. Toward that end, the division supports a global research portfolio to advance biological knowledge of HIV/AIDS, its related co-infections, and co-morbidities.  For more information, visit the NIAID program page: https://www.niaid.nih.gov/about/daids
